|vo_01_01_rm         = Omae no nioi... ii nioi. Issho ni kari wo shiyou!
|vo_01_01_tl         = Your smell... Nice smell. Let's hunt together!

<!-- Chats -->
|vo_02_01_title      = 世間話・匂い
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Scent
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Scent.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = う、ウサギの匂い…
|vo_02_01_rm         = U, usagi no nioi...
|vo_02_01_tl         = Mm, smells like rabbit...

|vo_02_02_title      = 世間話・空腹
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Hunger
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Hunger.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 行くか、腹減った。
|vo_02_02_rm         = Iku ka, harahetta.
|vo_02_02_tl         = Let's go. I'm hungry.

|vo_02_03_title      = 世間話・見張り
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Wind-gazing
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Wind-gazing.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = オレは見張りをする。行くならオレを呼べ。
|vo_02_03_rm         = Ore wa mihari wo suru. Ikunara ore wo yobe.
|vo_02_03_tl         = I'll keep watch. Call me if you're going.

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = 雷の日・注意
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes: Warning
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes - Warning.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 怖いなら早く隠れろ。
|vo_03_01_rm         = Kowainara hayaku kakurero.
|vo_03_01_tl         = If you're scared, hide quickly.

|vo_03_02_title      = 雷の日・道案内
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes: Guidance
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes - Guidance.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 木から離れろ、ついて来い！
|vo_03_02_rm         = Ki kara hanarero, tsuite koi!
|vo_03_02_tl         = Keep away from the trees, follow me!

|vo_03_03_title      = 風の日…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It's Windy
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It's Windy.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 風…うん、気持ちいい。
|vo_03_03_rm         = Kaze... Un, kimochi ii.
|vo_03_03_tl         = The wind... Mm, feels good.

|vo_03_04_title      = 暴風の日…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 風…うぅ…チクチクして、ちょっと痛い。
|vo_03_04_rm         = Kaze... Uu... chikuchiku shite, chotto itai.
|vo_03_04_tl         = The wind... Uu... It's prickly, and hurts a bit.

<!-- Greetings -->
|vo_04_01_title      = おはよう…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 太陽が出た。一緒に狩りに行くか？
|vo_04_01_rm         = Taiyou ga deta. Issho ni kari ni iku ka?
|vo_04_01_tl         = The sun's come out. Do you want to hunt together?

|vo_04_02_title      = こんにちは…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 肉の塊食える、嬉しい！
|vo_04_02_rm         = Niku no katamari kueru, ureshii!
|vo_04_02_tl         = I can eat a big chunk of meat. I'm happy!

|vo_04_03_title      = こんばんは…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = お前は寝ろ。オレは月を見る。
|vo_04_03_rm         = Omae wa nero. Ore wa tsuki wo miru.
|vo_04_03_tl         = You sleep. I'll watch the moon.

|vo_04_04_title      = おやすみ…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = お前寝る。オレ見張る。明日、一緒に狩りする。
|vo_04_04_rm         = Omae neru. Ore miharu. Ashita, issho ni kari suru.
|vo_04_04_tl         = You sleep. I keep watch. Tomorrow, we hunt together.

<!-- About Razor -->
|vo_05_01_title      = {name}自身について…
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = オレは狼。人間のパパ、ママ、いない。
|vo_05_01_rm         = Ore wa ookami. Ningen no papa, mama, inai.
|vo_05_01_tl         = I am a wolf. I don't have a human mom or dad.

<!-- About Us -->
|vo_06_01_title      = 友達について…
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Friends
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Friends.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = お前、友達。オレとお前、一緒に狩りする。
|vo_06_01_rm         = Omae, tomodachi. Ore to omae, issho ni kari suru.
|vo_06_01_tl         = You are my friend. You and me, we hunt together.

|vo_06_02_title      = 武器について…
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Weapons
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Weapons.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = オレ、鉄の爪と雷の牙ある。お前を守る。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Ore, tetsu no tsume to kaminari no kiba aru. Omae wo mamoru.
|vo_06_02_tl         = I have iron claws and fangs of thunder. I protect you.

<!-- Miscellaneous I -->
|vo_07_01_title      = 「神の目」について…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 「神の目」、師匠のおかげ。雷の牙で戦う、「ルピカ」守る。
|vo_07_01_rm         = "Kami no me", shishou no okage. Kaminari no kiba de tatakau, "Rupika" mamoru.
|vo_07_01_tl         = I can use "Vision", thanks to Master. Fight with fangs of thunder, protect "Lupical".

|vo_07_02_title      = シェアしたいこと…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 夜、星きれい。空、湖、どこも星いっぱい。<br />夜、街の中も、星いっぱい。
|vo_07_02_rm         = Yoru, hoshi kirei. Sora, mizuumi, doko mo hoshi-ippai.<br />Yoru, machi no naka mo, hoshi-ippai.
|vo_07_02_tl         = At night, the stars are beautiful. The sky, the lake, everywhere is filled with stars.<br />At night, the city is also filled with stars.

|vo_07_03_title      = 興味のあること…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = オレの「ルピカ」は狼。彼らは家族。
|vo_07_03_rm         = Ore no "Rupika" wa ookami. Karera wa kazoku.
|vo_07_03_tl         = My "Lupical" are wolves. They are family.

<!-- About Others -->
|vo_08_01_title      = リサについて…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 師匠の雷、空黒くなる。怖い、強い。
|vo_08_01_rm         = Shishou no kaminari, sora kuroku naru. Kowai, tsuyoi.
|vo_08_01_tl         = Master's thunder makes the sky black. It's scary, and strong.

|vo_08_02_title      = バーバラについて…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Barbara]]
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Barbara.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = バーバラ、キラキラの女の子。優しい。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Baabara, kirakira no onnanoko. Yasashii.
|vo_08_02_tl         = Barbara, a sparkly girl. Kind.

|vo_08_03_title      = ディルックについて…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Diluc]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = ディルック、赤い、黒い。冷たくて、熱い。
|vo_08_03_rm         = Dirukku, akai, kuroi. Tsumetakute, atsui.
|vo_08_03_tl         = Diluc, red and black. Cold, and hot.

|vo_08_04_title      = ウェンティについて…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Venti]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Venti.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 詩…うっ、よく分からない。よく分からないけど、「ルピカ」は気に入ってる。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Uta... U', yokuwakaranai. Yoku wakaranaikedo, "Rupika" wa kini'itteru.
|vo_08_04_tl         = Poems... Uh, I don't really understand them. I don't really understand them, but "Lupical" like them.

|vo_08_05_title      = ベネットについて…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Bennett]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Bennett.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = ベネット、口数が多い、一緒にいると、腹いっぱいにならない。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Benetto, kuchikazu ga ooi, issho ni iru to, hara-ippai ni naranai.
|vo_08_05_tl         = Bennett, talkative. When I'm with him, I don't get full.

|vo_08_06_title      = クレーについて…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = クレー、友達！友達だけど、困る。
|vo_08_06_rm         = Kuree, tomodachi! Tomodachi dakedo, komaru.
|vo_08_06_tl         = Klee is my friend! Friend, but trouble.

|vo_08_07_title      = ファルカについて・知らない
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]: Stranger
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka - Stranger.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = ファルカ？知らない…
|vo_08_07_rm         = Faruka? Shiranai...
|vo_08_07_tl         = Varka? I don't know...

|vo_08_08_title      = ファルカについて・思い出
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]: Memory
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka - Memory.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = うん…ファルカは、名前だ。あの男、高く大きい。レザーの名前、鉄の爪、彼にもらった。ううっ…会いたい。
|vo_08_08_rm         = Un... Faruka wa, namaeda. Ano otoko, takaku ookii. Rezaa no namae, tetsu no tsume, kare ni moratta. Uu'... aitai.
|vo_08_08_tl         = Mm... Varka is a name. That man, tall and big. The name Razor, the iron claws, I got from him. Uu... I want to see him.

<!-- More About Razor -->
|vo_09_01_title      = {name}を知る・１
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = お前の匂い、優しい匂い。肉好きか？
|vo_09_01_rm         = Omae no nioi, yasashii nioi. Niku-suki ka?
|vo_09_01_tl         = You have a kind smell. Do you like meat?

|vo_09_02_title      = {name}を知る・２
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = お前強い。狼と同じくらい強い。お前と狩りするの好き。収穫多い。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Omae tsuyoi. Ookami to onaji kurai tsuyoi. Omae to kari suru no suki. Shuukaku ooi.
|vo_09_02_tl         = You're strong. Strong as a wolf. I like hunting with you. Lots of catches.

|vo_09_03_title      = {name}を知る・３
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 「ルピカ」は「狼の家」。違う、「狼の家族」。オレのルピカは森の中。彼ら、オレを守る。オレをルピカだと言った。
|vo_09_03_rm         = "Rupika" wa "ookami no ie". Chigau, "ookami no kazoku". Ore no Rupika wa mori no naka. Karera, ore wo mamoru. Ore wo Rupika da to itta.
|vo_09_03_tl         = "Lupical" means "Wolf home". No, "Wolf family". My Lupical are in the woods. They protect me. They said I am their Lupical.

|vo_09_04_title      = {name}を知る・４
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = オレにはルピカしかない。<br />でもルピカ、オレには4本の足がない。本物の狼じゃない。時々、悲しい。
|vo_09_04_rm         = Ore ni wa Rupika shika nai.<br />Demo Rupika, ore ni wa 4-hon no ashi ga nai. Honmono no ookami janai. Tokidoki, kanashii.
|vo_09_04_tl         = I only have my Lupical.<br />But even though I'm Lupical, I don't have four legs. I'm not a real wolf. Sometimes, I'm sad.

|vo_09_05_title      = {name}を知る・５
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = お前と一緒に走るの楽しい、お前と一緒に狩りするの楽しい。お前と一緒にいる。オレは狼、オレは人間、関係ない。<br />お前は友達、お前はオレの「ルピカ」。オレ、お前も嬉しくあってほしい。
|vo_09_05_rm         = Omae to issho ni hashiru no tanoshii, omae to issho ni kari suru no tanoshii. Omae to issho ni iru. Ore wa ookami, ore wa ningen, kankeinai.<br />Omae wa tomodachi, omae wa no "Rupika". Ore, omae mo ureshikuatte hoshii.
|vo_09_05_tl         = It's fun to run with you, it's fun to hunt with you. With you, it doesn't matter if I'm wolf, or I'm human.<br />You're my friend, you're my "Lupical". I want you to be happy too.

<!-- Miscellaneous II -->
|vo_10_01_title      = {name}の趣味…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = ルピカ好き。森好き。友達好き。走るの好き。
|vo_10_01_rm         = Rupika-suki. Mori-suki. Tomodachi-suki. Hashiru no suki.
|vo_10_01_tl         = I like my Lupical. I like the woods. I like my friends. I like running.

|vo_10_02_title      = {name}の悩み…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 話すの疲れる。難しい。でも、話さないはダメ。
|vo_10_02_rm         = Hanasu no tsukareru. Muzukashii. Demo, hanasanai wa dame.
|vo_10_02_tl         = Talking makes me tired. It's hard. But, I can't not talk.

|vo_10_03_title      = 好きな食べ物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 肉好き。イモ好き。
|vo_10_03_rm         = Niku-suki. Imo-suki.
|vo_10_03_tl         = I like meat. I like potatoes.

|vo_10_04_title      = 嫌いな食べ物…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 野菜だめ。オレが食ってる肉たちは野菜を食う。
|vo_10_04_rm         = Yasai dame. Ore ga kutteru niku-tachi wa yasai wo kuu.
|vo_10_04_tl         = Vegetables not good. The meat I eat, they eat vegetables.

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title      = 贈り物を受け取る·1
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 匂いがいい、味もいい。好き。
|vo_11_01_rm         = Nioi ga ii, aji mo ii. Suki.
|vo_11_01_tl         = Smell is good, taste is good too. I like it.

|vo_11_02_title      = 贈り物を受け取る·2
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx         = 食うと、力が出る、嬉しい。
|vo_11_02_rm         = Kuu to, chikara ga deru, ureshii.
|vo_11_02_tl         = I eat, I get strength, I'm happy.

|vo_11_03_title      = 贈り物を受け取る·3
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx         = 食う、よくない。食わない、よくない。少し悲しい。
|vo_11_03_rm         = Kuu, yokunai. Kuwanai, yokunai. Sukoshi kanashii.
|vo_11_03_tl         = Eat, not good. Don't eat, not good. A bit sad.

<!-- Birthday -->
|vo_12_01_title      = 誕生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 今日はお前の……ずっとずっと前の今日に、お前生まれた。お前と一緒に楽しみたい。今日一緒に肉食う。
|vo_12_01_rm         = Kyou wa omae no...... Zutto zutto mae no kyou ni, omae umareta. Omae to issho ni tanoshi mitai. Kyou issho ni nikukuu.
|vo_12_01_tl         = Today is your...... A long long time ago today, you were born. I want to enjoy with you. Eat meat together today.

<!-- Feelings About Ascension -->
|vo_13_01_title      = 突破した感想・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx         = 腕、太くなった…？
|vo_13_01_rm         = Ude, futoku natta...?
|vo_13_01_tl         = Are my arms thicker...?

|vo_13_02_title      = 突破した感想・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx         = ガルルル…爪研ぎ、牙を研ぐ、もっと強く！
|vo_13_02_rm         = Garururu... tsumetogi, kiba wo togu, motto tsuyoku!
|vo_13_02_tl         = Grrr... Sharpen my claws, sharpen my fangs, stronger!

|vo_13_03_title      = 突破した感想・転
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx         = 走る、狩る。足りない、だめ！もっと…強くなる！
|vo_13_03_rm         = Hashiru, karu. Tarinai, dame! Motto... Tsuyokunaru!
|vo_13_03_tl         = Run, hunt. Not enough... no! I'll be stronger!

|vo_13_04_title      = 突破した感想・結
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx         = 牙、爪、足。もっと強く、もっと力を…お前を守る！
|vo_13_04_rm         = Kiba, tsume, ashi. Motto tsuyoku, motto chikara wo... omae wo mamoru!
|vo_13_04_tl         = Fangs, claws, legs. Stronger, more power... Protect you!
}}
